participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and passionate about music and cars.
participant_1.background: i've two dogs. my favorite music is country. i like to go to country concerts on weekends. i like to work on vintage cars. i own two vintage mustangs.

participant_2.name: Laura
participant_2.personality: Friendly and devoted, with a love for family and sports.
participant_2.background: i drive a mini van. coffee is my preferred beverage. i coach little league baseball. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i've five sons.
